page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: In 1985 people in this area live in houses and bungalows which are either terraced,semi-detached or detached. Many people live on farms or in farm cottages.Some of the farm houses are very old.Shonks Farmhouse was built in 1540 or possibly earlier.Walls of wattle and daub have recently been uncovered.A brick outside oven was also discovered. Many people live in houses which are converted places of work.There are several 'Forge Cottages'which were once local forges.The Toll House in Northchapel collected the dues from travellers travelling between London and Petworth.Vine Cottage was the local harness and saddle makers.
